report.rawcontent: all plots 26-Jun-97 : B : Sludges applied as treatment. 29-Jul-97 : B : Mechanical spade cultivated. 03-Sep-97 : B : Rolled. 10-Sep-97 : B : Gallup at 6.0 1 in 2001. 18-Sep-97 : B : Rotary harrowed, Atalja Italian Ryegrass, drilled at 40 kg. 22-Sep-97 : B : Rolled. 31-Mar-98 : B : Muriate of potash at 120 kg. 34.5% N at 261 kg. 07-Apr-98 : T : SLUDGE Tl, T19, T20: Triple superphosphate at 64 kg. 07-Apr-98 : T : SLUDGE Tl, Ti6, T17, T18, T19, T20: 27% N at 222 kg. 09-May-98 : B : Legumex Extra at 7.0 1 in 200 1. 02-Jul-98 : B : Cut. 09-Sep-98 : B : Cut, no yields

Anchor, at 380 seeds/m with the Accord drill. 23-Nov-98 : B : : Decoy at 5.0 kg. 19-Mar-99 : B : : tm)Xsoguard at 2.0 1 in 200 1. : B : : tm)Platform S at 1.0 kg in 200 1. 03-Apr-99 : B : : 34.5% N at 116 kg. 25-Apr-99 : B : : tm)Folicur at 0.5 1 in 200 1. : B : : tm)Tripart Brevis at 2.0 1 in 200 1. 29-Apr-99 : B : : Muriate of potash at 150 kg. 27% N at 370 kg. 07-May-99 : B : : Ally at 30 g in 200 1. 27-May-99 : B : : tm)Folicur at 0.75 1 in 200 1. : B : : tm)Sipcam UK Rover 500 at 1.0 1 in 200 Ll. 22-Aug-99 : B : : Combine harvested, straw chopped.

all plots 25-Sep-99 : B : : Treatments applied. Mechanical spade cultivated three times. 05-Oct-99 : B : : Rotary harrowed. 12-Oct-99 : B : : Broadcast Cotswold ryegrass Mix A at 40 kg. Rolled. 12-Nov-99 : B : : Spannit at 1.5 1 in 1001. 25-Feb-00 : B : : Muriate of potash at 100 kg. 34.5% N at 116 kg. : B : T1,T19,T20 : Triple superphosphate at 63.8 kg. 19-Mar-00 : T : : Legumex Extra at 7.0 1 in 200 1. 07-Apr-00 : B : : Broadcast Danergo and Ligrane ryegrass 50:50 mix at 30 kg. 11-Apr-00 : B : : 27.0% N at 259 kg.
